title: Trust: Ledger Verification
subtitle: Verify cryptographic integrity of an AI memory trail
methodology: Verifying the hash chain and agent identity of the distributed ledger. Sharc uses context-aware HMAC-SHA256 verifiable trails.
whyItMatters: Trust verification ensures no agent has tampered with shared memory. Without cryptographic proof, multi-agent coordination is unsafe.

title: Engine Footprint
subtitle: Package size + baseline heap
methodology: Total download/package + idle heap. Smaller = faster cold starts, better for mobile/edge.
whyItMatters: Every KB of engine weight delays cold start. At 50KB, Sharc loads 30× faster than SQLite's 1.5MB WASM binary.

title: Primitives (Sharc-only)
subtitle: Byte-level decode — no equivalent elsewhere
methodology: Sharc internals: header parse (8.5ns/0B), varint decode (231ns/100/0B). No equivalent in other engines.
whyItMatters: These primitives are the foundation of every operation. Single-digit nanosecond parsing shows the zero-overhead design philosophy.
